Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball helped keep the Bulls within 61-54 of the Cavaliers by halftime.
One play in the third quarter stood out that had the home fans lustily approving.
Post-Match Reflections: Lonzo Ball's two-way impact on Friday was impressive and fans will hope he can have an impact on the new season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lonzo Ball was greeted with a standing ovation on Wednesday when he played for the Chicago Bulls for the first time since January 2022.
He effectively orchestrated the plays and contributed in rebounding and on defense.
